GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ksmbd: prevent out of bound read for SMB2_WRITE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 0f1c9908c8e18a98b3d6a80bf391bef8001d7fb7, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit e2f34481b24db2fd634b5edb0a5bd0e4d38cc6e9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ksmbd: prevent out of bound read for SMB2_WRITE
